demos.text: There's nice and quiet, small but enough for 6 (or more).
Its a great place for a casual date or to entertain clients for lunch.
This is my first computer purchase
Its very nice and once you learn the features you will be so happy to have such a sophisticated computer.
The space is a bit too small for live music, so on  jazz nights, it can be loud and cramped.

signature.instructions: Given a text review, identify and extract the specific aspects or features of the laptop or netbook that are mentioned, such as battery life, GUI, or applications.
